DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : Male female age 18 65 year Ambulatory hospitalize monitor Fluent French able understand study procedure , include complete autoquestionnaires Registered French social security scheme Signed inform consent patient collect inclusion study Cluster Headache Obesity patient Contraindication Magnetoencephalography ( MEG ) and/or Electroencephalography ( EEG ) Contraindication Magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) All category protect person
